boardgame.name: Tomb
boardgame.description: Recruit a Party. Kill the Monsters. Take Their Stuff!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Tomb pits opponents against one another in a game of monsters, traps, treasures, and spells. Attempts to capture the dungeon crawl experience without hours of preparation. Assemble a crack squad of adventurers and enter the fabled Goldenaxe Catacombs in search of glory and hidden treasure. With Tomb_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s unique set-up and character recruitment, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll never play the same game twice._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Tomb: Cryptmaster_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG 5001) Enter At Your Own Risk! Tomb pits opponents against one another in a fast paced board game of monsters, traps, and treasures. After assembling your party from a plethora of random characters in the Inn, you set out into the Tomb. The Tomb is created as the game begins, with each player hiding treasure, traps, and monsters in each crypt, unknown to the other players. Do you remember where you left the chest of gold? Better hope your opponent didn’t put a Pain Eater in the same crypt! No rogues at the Inn today? Hope you don’t run into a poison dart trap! Tomb captures the fast-paced feel of a dungeon crawl without the hours of set up before hand. Just grab your party and go. Each character brings unique abilities, and with the map changing every game as well as the available characters, no two games will ever be the same.

Released: GenCon 2008

*** Available for pickup at Origins 2014 – Open to offers *** Condition: Game comes from a smoke free and pet free home. Includes all game components. Played once and game is in near mint condition. All cards are sleeved and show no wear. Includes game organizer cut from black foam core (will add pictures this weekend). Plastic insert did not fit sleeved cards and is not included with game. If you are not interested in the sleeves - I can remove them and lower the price $10. Pickup Options (no shipping costs): 1. Going to Origins 2014? I will be there from Thursday till Sunday and would be happy to bring the game to you. 2. Game is located in Chantilly, VA, if you are in the local area we can arrange a time for pickup. Shipping Options (from Zip code 20151): Will ship using preferred method (USPS, UPS, FedEx, etc) and buyer will pay postage. Happy to combine postage for multiple items. I will pay for insurance and tracking. Hurry – Game sale ends June 10, 2014. After that time, I am going close the sale and put the game in the Origins silent auction. In addition to this game, I pulled 15 more games to sell in the Origin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s silent auction on Friday (6/13). If you would like a copy of the game list please geek mail me. Ask if you have any questions or concerns.
